column4: what is the easies way of installing php 5.3.3 on ubuntu ( i would rather not compile, and the api-get stuff are just 5,3,2)
The PHP 5 version in Ubuntu 10.10 is 5.3.3. Which Ubuntu version are you using?
10.04, because i had to reinstall to it after an upgrade to 10.10 broke my machine down
you could try downloading DEBs from here: http://packages.ubuntu.com/maverick/php5 (plus all the other PHP packages). This is the maverick deb, which is 5.3.3
